examples.title: hello-world
examples.description: A beginner smart contract with examples of commonly used Clarity expressions and data structures.

examples.title: blank-project
examples.description: A blank project confirms to Clarinet-compliant project structure.

examples.title: counter
examples.description: Demonstrates how to use and interact with variables in Clarity by incrementing a 32-bit unsigned integer

examples.title: clarity-bitcoin
examples.description: Demonstrates how to parse Bitcoin transactions and block headers, and to verify Bitcoin transactions

examples.title: fungible-token
examples.description: Demonstrates a basic fungible token that conforms to the SIP-010 FT standard.

examples.title: non-fungible-token
examples.description: Demonstrates a basic NFT collection that conforms to the SIP-009 NFT standard.

examples.title: nft-marketplace
examples.description: Demonstartes a minimalistic NFT marketplace that allows users to list NFT for sale.

examples.title: lightning-swaps
examples.description: Demonstrates LNSwap's Submarine Swaps between assets on Stacks <-> Bitcoin.

examples.title: ordyswap
examples.description: Demonstrates a trustless atomic swaps between Ordinals and Stacks (STX).
